title: What is CrossFit Open 20.3 workout – deadlifts, handstand push-ups and handstand walk
text:
The CrossFit Open 20.3 workout has been announced, the third of five.

The Open is an online competition. Athletes upload their scores, with a video if they want them verified, of a weekly workout. The winner at the end of the five weeks earns a spot at the CrossFit Games.

Last year, for the first time, the top Open score from each country also earned a spot at the Games. CrossFit is a fitness-based competition. Athletes have to be prepared for anything, from burpees to heavy weight lifts.

CrossFit Workout 20.3

For time:

21 deadlifts, 225 lb.

21 handstand push-ups

15 deadlifts, 225 lb.

15 handstand push-ups

Nine deadlifts, 225 lb.

Nine handstand push-ups

21 deadlifts, 315 lb.

50-ft. handstand walk

15 deadlifts, 315 lb.

50-ft. handstand walk

Nine deadlifts, 315 lb.

50-ft. handstand walk

Time cap: nine min
description: The third workout has been announced for the 2020 season
